main_h1: Profitable trading bots for beginners in cryptocurrencies
main_h3: Complete security, convenience and transparent investment without commissions. Straight Finance - the possibility of high income even for those who do not understand cryptocurrencies
percents: 10% of the referred friend's investment in USDT
payment_from_friend: Payment from each investment of a friend
step_1: Make sure you have the MetaMask extension installed in your browser. You can also use Wallet Connect to connect from your smartphone through any mobile wallet such as Trust Wallet. Don't forget to top up your wallet balance. If you do not know how, write to us on Telegram
step_2: Click "Connect Wallet" above and choose one of the methods described above. Make sure you have BSC (Binance Smart Chain) selected. Enter the amount in USDT and confirm the transaction in your wallet.
step_3: Once the payment is completed, you will be placed in a queue. You just have to wait for your turn and when it's your turn, click on the "Claim" button at the top of the screen to receive your funds.
peculiarities_description: You may not know what "crypto" is, or you may be a professional trader - in Straight Finance you will find the easiest and safest tool for making a profit
security_1: Straight Finance is a financial system based on smart contracts and bots that eliminates the human factor and provides impeccable accuracy and efficiency.
security_2: Transactions, payouts and investments in Straight Finance are public through the use of blockchain. The code of the system is open and available for viewing by users, providing complete transparency and trust.
security_3: Straight Finance provides 24/7 support via live chat on social media. Our administrators are always ready to help and support you.
profit_automation_1: Work using the principle "Invest and earn" where the robot trades, allowing you to avoid the need for constant study of the markets.
profit_automation_2: Opportunity to reinvest earnings with compound interest
profit_automation_3: Investments and payouts are made in USDT. No more worrying about fluctuations in cryptocurrency rates
increasing_earnings_1: We offer a generous referral program: earn 10% of every investment made by your friends through your referral link or code. Increase your income by attracting new users to the system.
increasing_earnings_2: With the Straight Finance referral program you get instant payouts - 10% of your friend's investment is automatically credited with no delay or waiting. Get your rewards immediately.
increasing_earnings_3: Buy an SFinance token and get a share of the project's profits. Explore the NFT MASK Collection for more options to increase your return on investment. Details in the Token and NFT section.
growing_value_1: SFinance is the token of the Straight Finance project, which allows its holders to receive a share of the project's profits
growing_value_2: The SFinance token has a limited supply, and we regularly burn some of the tokens, removing them from circulation. This approach increases the value of each token and increases the share of each holder.
growing_value_3: Buying and holding NFT MASK from our collection will be a profitable investment even for those who do not plan to invest, as their value will grow along with the development of the Straight Finance project.
staking_1: You have the opportunity to stake SFinance tokens and receive a fixed percentage of 20% per annum (APR). At the same time, your tokens will not be blocked, and you can withdraw the principal amount of the deposit along with earned interest at any time.
staking_2: In addition, while your tokens are staked, you will receive a share of the project's profits depending on your stake in the token. This gives you the opportunity to receive additional income from your participation in the project.
sfinance_tokenomics: Ownership of the SFinance token gives the right to receive a part of the profits of the Straight Finance project
nft_sell_1: We offer you the opportunity to increase the return on your investment by purchasing our NFTs, which guarantee an additional percentage of earnings.
nft_sell_2: Even if you are not interested in investing in our project, buying NFTs will still be a good investment, because with the growing popularity of Straight Finance, their value will increase due to their real application.
question_2: How does Straight Finance make money?
question_4: Why is it better for me to use Straight Finance instead of trading myself?
question_5: I don't want to invest USDT, but I want to make money with Straight Finance. What can I do?
question_6: I still have questions, where can I ask them?
answer_1: Straight Finance is a structured product that allows users to earn high returns even if they are not familiar with cryptocurrencies
answer_2: Straight Finance uses various sources of income. For example, we use official spot trading bots from Binance or liquidity supply in unsiwap v3. It is important to understand that we do not use dangerous instruments such as futures or options. Your funds are safe!
answer_3: Yes, it's more than safe. We do not use instruments where funds can be liquidated, such as futures or margined options. We do not use leverage or other tools to increase our positions, as this could involve the risk of liquidation of users' funds. Therefore, we mainly use spot trading
answer_4: Our project invites you to invest with a return of 10% (and even more if you have NFT). One investment cycle usually takes 1-2 months, providing an average of 5%-10% monthly increase to the initial deposit without unnecessary risks. While independent trading will require you to: - Analyze the state of the market - Follow the latest news - Risk with your own funds in significant amounts to achieve the same 5% -10% monthly yield. In Straight Finance, you can invest your USDT and go about your business in peace, and then take the profits. In addition, many investors are not limited to one-time investments. They reinvest their profits. The following happens: Users invest in common capital -> Capital grows -> Capital gain increases -> Daily profit increases and turnover becomes more dynamic -> More users receive their payouts and reinvest again.
answer_5: There are several ways where you can earn good money: - Referral program. You can invite your friends and earn 10% of each friend's investment. In this case, the friend does not lose anything. For example: I invited a friend who is investing 1000 USDT. I get 100 USDT to my account instantly, and a friend joins the queue of investors and after that he will receive 1100 USDT (+10%) - SFinance utility token. Every day we distribute all profits among SFinance holders. You can buy an SFinance token and receive a share of the profits. Moreover, the SFinance token is deflationary. Simply put, over time it becomes less and less, so its price is growing! -Utility NFT. You can buy NFTs from our collection and hold them for later resale. Each NFT increases the return on investment (from 1% to 100%), while the effects of different NFTs add up! The number of NFTs is also limited, so their value is growing
answer_6: We will always be happy to answer your questions in our telegram group
